title: Lee Health Regional Cancer Center
description: At Lee Health, your healthcare is personal. National leaders in primary care, pediatrics, orthopedics and more. Call 239-481-4111 to schedule an appointment.
cleaned_text: Our Locations The Lee Health Cancer Institute is serving Southwest Florida's patients and provides access to cancer specific services and treatments. Lee Health has expanded its cancer location to Bonita Springs to care for all patients in our Estero community. Find the cancer care location
